short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful Xiaoshouyi developer tools,includes Query Editor, Fields definition,ERDs, and others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Xiaoshouyi DevTools is a powerful Xiaoshouyi developer chrome extension for doing the below things :

・Quick One Click Login
・Query Editor, generating SQL by mouse click, exporting query result to Excel
・Show/Hide field API name on object detail page
・Exporting Object Fields API Reference as Excel
・Exporting Xiaoshouyi data model (ERDs) as svg
・Object Fields query
